item.title: Sean add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "No matter how careful you are, there's going to be the sense you missed something, the collapsed feeling under your skin that you didn't experience it all. There's that fallen heart feeling that you rushed right through the moments where you should've been paying attention. Well, get used to that feeling. That's how your whole life will feel some day. This is all practice." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Sean add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "No matter how much you think you love somebody, you'll step back when the pool of their blood edges up too close." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Sean add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "Hysteria is impossible without an audience. Panicking by yourself is the same as laughing alone in an empty room. You feel really silly." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Sean add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "There are only patterns, patterns on top of patterns, patterns that affect other patterns. Patterns hidden by patterns. Patterns within patterns. If you watch close, history does nothing but repeat itself. What we call chaos is just patterns we haven't recognized. What we call random is just patterns we can't decipher. what we can't understand we call nonsense. What we can't read we call gibberish. There is no free will. There are no variables." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Sean add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "When you understand, that what you're telling is just a story. It isn't happening anymore. When you realize the story you're telling is just words, when you can just crumble up and throw your past in the trashcan, then we'll figure out who you're going to be." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Sean add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "The only reason why we ask other people how their weekend was is so we can tell them about our own weekend." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Sean add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "The one you love and the one who loves you are never, ever the same person." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Sean add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "Nothing of me is original. I am the combined effort of everyone I've ever known." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Sean add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "The idea that I can't share my problems with other people makes me not give a shit about their problems." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Sean add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "People are all over the world telling their one dramatic story and how their life has turned into getting over this one event. Now their lives are more about the past than their future." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Sean add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "This is your life and its ending one moment at a time." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Sean add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
Sean add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
item.description: "But did thee feel the earth move?" -- Ernest Hemingway

item.title: Sean add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
item.description: "A cat has absolute emotional honesty: human beings, for one reason or another, may hide their feelings, but a cat does not." -- Ernest Hemingway
